mapper.select: select rating,nick_name,title,content,review_date,r.review_id,count(user_id) as count,goods_name,r.goods_id from review as r left join review_like as l on r.review_id=l.review_id left join tb_newbee_mall_order_item as o on o.order_id=r.order_id where r.goods_id= #{goodsId} AND proved=0 group by l.review_id order by count desc;
